description:
Are you a teacher? Do you want to be a better teacher? 
 
Then, fly high with iTDi! The iTDI Summer School MOOC For English Teachers is four weeks of TEFL teacher development training delivered one session at a time by the faculty, mentors, associates, and leading community members of iTDi.  Choose what you want to learn from a wide range of sessions. Learn more about teaching reading, writing, listening and speaking. 
Become better teachers of grammar and vocabulary. Get the latest on motivation, research, classroom management, and more. Learn how to make your own materials, design your own games, and write your own raps. Discover how to create projects, set up a blog, use the latest apps, bring art into your classroom, and use social media in class. Each session comes with a pre-class task and a post class quiz. All participants will receive an iTDi backed Certificate of Participation. Successful participants will be eligible to receive iTDi-certified professional development credit. There is no end date for this course.
title: iTDI Summer School MOOC For English Teachers
